Module Programming
Package org.hust.entity.bike

Class Bike

java.lang.Object
org.hust.entity.bike.Bike
Direct Known Subclasses:
EBike, NormalBike, TwinBike
public abstract class Bike
extends java.lang.Object
Bike class is an abstract class that all types of bike need to extend from

  • Method Details

    • getBike

      public static Bike getBike​(java.lang.String barcode) throws InvalidBarcodeException
      Connect to the database to retrieve the information of the bike with correspond barcode.
      Parameters:
      barcode - the barcode of the bike to retrieved
      Returns:
      Bike with that barcode
      Throws:
      InvalidBarcodeException - if fail to retrieve any bike with that barcode

    • getBikeById

      public static Bike getBikeById​(java.lang.String id)
      Connect to the database to retrieve the information of the bike with correspond id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the bike to retrieved
      Returns:
      Bike with that id

    • unlock

      public void unlock()
      Unlock the bike, then register the new status to the database.

      Lock the bike, then register the new status to the database.

    • documentToBike

      public abstract Bike documentToBike​(org.bson.Document document)
      The abstract function require the children class to generate a function to set a document to that children class
      Parameters:
      document - the document needed to be cast
      Returns:
      the child class object

    • getTotalCharge

      public int getTotalCharge()
      Total charge is the total price to pay including deposit, fee, tax...

      In case total charge < 0, customer is refunded

      Returns:
      total charge
